title: Transformed: the Story of Brittany Talissa King, Beautiful Warrior and host of American Shade
description:
Brittany tells the story of her upbringing in a strong love-filled family, facing racism, battling addictions, seeking Christ and learning what she is capable of accomplishing. She  is now a thought leader in the space of discourse around the issues of racial reconciliation. Connect with her on Twitter and watch her many excellent YouTube conversations.

Twitter:  @KingTalissa

YouTube: American Shade with Brittany King
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQVlAwsrGCKLA-3pUudSRjQ

Brittany with Bret Weinstein: https://youtu.be/j3nuTSMUK-8

Articles/Essays

"Our Skin Problem: America's Toxic Bias of Color."
https://medium.com/@brtking.7/our-skin-problem-americas-toxic-bias-of-color-f4c6b432ef4a
 
 "Free Black Thought"
https://www.tabletmag.com/sections/arts-letters/articles/dubois-washington-black-lives-matter

"Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Already Showed Us How To Be An Anti-Racist."
 https://brtking-7.medium.com/dr-martin-luther-king-jr-already-showed-us-how-to-be-an-anti-racist-5a667ef3cf7d
  
"Racism-19, our other pandemic."
http://www.therepublic.com/2020/06/05/racism19_our_other_pandemic/
  
"I Am Not Gonna Let You Finish, Kanye."
https://www.thedailybeast.com/no-kanye-west-im-not-gonna-let-you-finish

American Shade Episodes:

"Writing Tips I Learned from Ta-Nehisi Coates."
https://youtu.be/QETGFpiWX1M

"Former BLM organizer thoughts on "The Right," "The Left," and #BlackLivesMatter"
https://youtu.be/vVPQI-blZAI

"Dear, Jordan Peterson....| from a former BLM organizer| Brittany Talissa King"
https://youtu.be/PeJlHHatT3E

"A Debate on #CriticalRaceTheory | Anti-CRT vs. Pro-CRT | A Panel Discussion"
https://youtu.be/-mgJ6XakmAg

"Brittany Talissa King &  @Kimi Katiti : 2 Perspectives, Let's Talk [Race Relations in America]
https://youtu.be/Q6kWM9Azfio

"White woman from TULSA asked me, "How do I discuss RACE ISSUES with Black ppl?" | My response..."
https://youtu.be/mhhu6W4V1WE
